Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Hollow carbon nanospheres with microporous shells

Other Information.Additional Info: HCSNs act as a physical barrier to vanadium ion diffusion while facilitating proton transport.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Ultrafast proton transport through internal cavities

Other Information.Additional Info: Protons move efficiently through the hollow interior and micropores of HCSNs.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with ultrafast proton transport channels

Experimental Validation.Method: Permeability testing, LF-NMR analysis, VFB performance evaluation
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Proton conductivity: 0.084 S·cm−1, Proton selectivity: 6.68 × 10^5 S·min·cm−3

Other Information.Additional Info: HCSNs improve mechanical strength, chemical stability, and proton conductivity of SPEEK membranes in vanadium flow batteries.

Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Polymer matrix embedded with hollow carbon sieving nanospheres

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion by microporous carbon shell

Other Information.Additional Info: Vanadium ion permeability significantly reduced compared to pure SPEEK membrane.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Fast proton transport through hollow cavities

Other Information.Additional Info: Proton conductivity enhanced due to accessible internal cavities of HCSNs.

Sieving Mechanism: Ion sieving by microporous carbon shell and ultrafast proton transport via hollow cavities

Experimental Validation.Method: Permeability testing, VFB single-cell cycling tests, LF-NMR characterization
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: EE: 84%, Capacity decay: 0.065% per cycle at 120 mA·cm−2

Other Information.Additional Info: Hybrid membrane exhibits superior proton selectivity and long-term stability in vanadium flow battery applications.
